original: assert (N >= K) as HNKG by omega. assert (k0 <= n0 + N * p - K * p) as Hkn'. + rewrite Hn, Hk. omega. + assert (k0 + K * p <= n0 + N * p) as Hkn'' by omega. rewrite Nat.add_sub_assoc in Hkn''; try omega. rewrite <- Hn, <- Hk in Hkn''. assert (k0 + K * p = n0 + N * p - (N - K) * p) as Hkp by omega. rewrite Hkp. omega.
